description: printouts from multiple-aligned protein or DNA sequences

children.name: sequence_characters
children.prompt: How many sequence characters per line

children.name: lines
children.prompt: How many lines between two sequence blocks

children.name: character_size
children.prompt: Character size in Points (except for HTML and ASCII output formats)

children.name: label_identical
children.prompt: Special label for identical residues in all sequences

children.comment: The threshold is the fraction of residues that must be identical or similar for shading to occur.
children.name: threshold
different_foreground
children.prompt: Foreground for different residues (lowercase choices mean lowercase letters in the sequence)

children.name: identical_foreground
children.prompt: Foreground for identical residues (lowercase choices mean lowercase letters in the sequence)

children.name: similar_foreground
children.prompt: Foreground for similar residues (lowercase choices mean lowercase letters in the sequence)

children.name: conserved_background
children.prompt: Background for conserved residues (if special label for identical residues)

children.name: conserved_foreground
children.prompt: Foreground for conserved residues (lowercase choices mean lowercase letters in the sequence)

children.name: show_normal
children.prompt: Show this sequence in all-normal rendition

precond.perl: $output_format ne "1" and $output_format ne "e" and $output_format ne "2" and $output_format ne "d" and $output_format ne "c" and $output_format ne "4"
precond.python: output_format != "1" and output_format != "e" and output_format != "2" and output_format != "d" and output_format != "c" and output_format != "4"

name: boxshade

precond.perl: $output_format ne "1" and $output_format ne "e" and $output_format ne "2" and $output_format ne "d" and $output_format ne "c" and $output_format ne "4"
precond.python: output_format != "1" and output_format != "e" and output_format != "2" and output_format != "d" and output_format != "c" and output_format != "4"

title: BOXSHADE
